title: Totally Wrong and Totally Legal: A Sheriff Buys a Beach House with Inmate Food Funds | Chloe x Halle
itunes:title: Totally Wrong and Totally Legal: A Sheriff Buys a Beach House with Inmate Food Funds | Chloe x Halle
description:
Trump fires VA Secretary David Shulkin, Michael Kosta gives props to a self-enriching sheriff in Alabama, and Chloe x Halle discuss their debut album "The Kids Are Alright."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
